Takuto

Group (2023-present):
TOZ

Introduction

Takato is a member of the boy group TOZ under YY Entertainment. They made their debut on September 27, 2023 with the mini album FLARE.

He gained fame as a participant in the Korean reality show “Boys Planet”.
